text: Julian Alexander Bream CBE (15 July 1933 â€“ 14 August 2020) was an EnglishSensier and Wade, 2001 virtuoso classical guitarist and lutenist. He was one of the best known classical guitarists of the 20th century. He worked for RCA Victor and EMI Classics many times. These recordings won him several awards, including four Grammy Awards, two for Best Chamber Music Performance and two for Best Classical Performance.Grammy Award Winners Bream died on 14 August 2020 at his home in Wiltshire, aged 87. ==References== Category:British Grammy Award winners Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English guitarists Category:Musicians from London
title: Julian Bream
